ygData.subject: Re: Where to go at low levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Lake Rathe is great until level 23 if you the boredom doesn t get to you after a couple of levels.  After Lake Rathe head to the Aviak City in South Karana.
ygData.messageBody:
Lake Rathe is great until level 23 if you the boredom doesn't get to
you after a couple of levels. After Lake Rathe head to the Aviak City in
South Karana. If you don't get burned out on Aviaks, you can stay there
until level 27 or 28 easily.. longer if you just go after mainly Avocets.
Pretty good loot on the mobs in the Aviak City too.

Gabryel (No surname, not needed)
26th Bard, Erollisi Marr

On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, TommyC wrote:

> I just want to start off by saying that this board has made my time as a young bard a real joy :-) keep up the good work.
> Now that I'm 21st level and have a bit of padding<1 /12 bub> on the exp bar I would like to know where is a good place to hunt at my level for exp/loot I am now at LakeRathe.
>
> 0-5 Qeynos/qeynos hills
> 5-8 Qeynos sewers Thugs/smuggs/sharkes
> 8-12 BB Giant Snakes
> 12-16 Noble Isle A.K.A. Wisp Isle in erud crossing
> 16-19 HighHold Orc Side
> 19-20 Lake Rathe 3 spawn Guard tower
> 20-21 South Karanas Hermit/Treants
> 21-25 ?
> 25-30 ?
> 30-40 ?
> 40-50 ?
>
> I need to hunt for exp and also loot I know that ppl say the loot gets better as you increase in level but I only have 9pp to my name after buying my armor<bronze> so I need to make some plat as well :-)
>
> Thanks for your help,
> *********************************
> Pinen Warsong
> Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
> Bard of the 21st Song
> *********************************
